meanings.sent1: The stemmata displayed the family's history in a clear format.
meanings.sent2: I found the stemmata of my ancestors in an old book.
meanings.sent3: The stemmata was so detailed, it even included the family pet's lineage.
meanings.sent4: The stemmata of our family was like a roadmap leading back through time.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the stemmata made it easy to trace our roots.

meanings.sent1: She proudly showed me the stemmata of her relatives.
meanings.sent2: The stemmata hanging on the wall depicted generations of family members.
meanings.sent3: The stemmata looked like a tree with branches reaching out to the past.
meanings.sent4: The stemmata of our family was like a living document, growing with each new member.
meanings.sent5: The colorful leaves on the stemmata represented different branches of the family tree.

meanings.sent1: The stemmata traced our lineage back to the first settlers in the town.
meanings.sent2: Each branch on the stemmata represented a different ancestor.
meanings.sent3: The stemmata seemed to whisper the stories of our forefathers.
meanings.sent4: The stemmata was like a thread connecting us to our roots.
meanings.sent5: The ancient scroll revealed the stemmata of our noble lineage.
